Package adrenaline.model.map

Class SpawnPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.model.map.Square
      • adrenaline.model.map.SpawnPoint
  • public class SpawnPoint
extends Square
    Spawn Point is a special Square in which a player can spawn after being killed and from where can grab weapons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      SpawnPoint​(int id, java.lang.String color, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> links)
      Constructor which initialize the attributes of a spawn point

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpawnPoint

        public SpawnPoint​(int id,
                  java.lang.String color,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> links)
        Constructor which initialize the attributes of a spawn point
        Parameters:
        id - is the square id of the spawn point
        color - is the room's color where the spawn point is located
        links - is a list which contains the squares' id reachable from the spawn point

    • Method Detail

        the weapons on the spawn point

        Setter to place weapons on the spawn point

      • removeWeapon

        public void removeWeapon​(Weapon w)
        Method to remove a weapon from a spawn point
        Parameters:
        w - is the weapon to be removed
